body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sub="urn://subscription.api.emp.altarix.ru">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <sub:sendSubscriptionStreamEventsRequest>
            <sub:token>5b5b11cb57b5a84874ead34c85b6d64a</sub:token>
            <sub:id>39121674-0fdf-4263-a251-8dfabecfc5f6</sub:id>
            <sub:systemId>SOESG</sub:systemId>
            <sub:datetime>2021-03-17T18:51:22.711969</sub:datetime>
            <sub:events>
                <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                <sub:event>
                    <sub:id>3bafc901-d89c-40a7-a128-d24fdd250e30</sub:id>
                    <sub:streamId>6</sub:streamId>
                    <sub:typeId>3</sub:typeId>
                    <sub:filters operator="OR">
                        <sub:filter operator="AND">
                            <sub:persons operator="OR">
                                <sub:person>
                                    <sub:SSOID>5d7f980a-0cb3-420d-9a5b-c1facb744b0d</sub:SSOID>
                                </sub:person>
                            </sub:persons>
                        </sub:filter>
                    </sub:filters>
                    <sub:message>
                        <sub:parameters>
                            <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                            <sub:parameter>
                                <sub:name>PUSH_TEXT</sub:name>
                                <sub:value>test!!!test!!!test!!!</sub:value>
                            </sub:parameter>
                            <sub:parameter>
                                <sub:name>ELK_INT_ID</sub:name>
                                <sub:value>10000016</sub:value>
                            </sub:parameter>
                        </sub:parameters>

                    </sub:message>
                    <sub:datetime>2021-03-17T18:51:22.711969</sub:datetime>
                </sub:event>
            </sub:events>
        </sub:sendSubscriptionStreamEventsRequest>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
